remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 呈现控件之前， 必须为控件中的每一行创建一个对象。Before the control can be rendered, a object must be created for each row in the control. 每次创建控件中的行时都会引发事件 。The event is raised each time a row in the control is created. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程（如将自定义内容添加到行）。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs. 同样，控件中的每一行都必须绑定到数据源中的记录，然后才能 呈现控件。Similarly, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source before the control can be rendered. 当对象) (表示的数据行 绑定到控件中的数据时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when a data row (represented by a object) is bound to data in the control. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程（如修改绑定到行的数据的值）。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式将 委托添加到 控件的事件 。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control.
